my:RequirementsInformation.my:RequirementsTitle: Refresh Server hosting Lotus Notes, at OK16

my:ISRInformation.my:ISRTitle: ECC09-0086 OK16 Callidus notes server refresh

u.font: 2.0.1 What is the Business Objective of this request?

td.style: BORDER-RIGHT: #517dbf 1pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; BORDER-TOP: #517dbf 1pt; PADDING-LEFT: 0px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0px; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-LEFT: #517dbf 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM: #517dbf 1pt; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent

font.div: Request is to refresh local server at Callidus site (OK16). The server name is Tulsa-LN1. Its currently running their Lotus Notes application and hosts their databases and legacy notes .nsf files.
Server has reached its end of warranty period with Dell and needs refreshed with new supported hardware.

div.font: The new hardware should also be sized to support their local Encompix application server that will come to EOW in Q1 2010. That system is a Dell PowerEdge 2850, ser # 4XM9Y61, with 3 gig RAM, and 300gig of drive space. Not sure how much is in use.

div.font: Current server is a Dell PowerEdge 2800 serial # DWHW461. 4 gigs of RAM, 300gigs of drive space for data storage. This server was originally purchased by Callidus.

li.font: The business customer will be responsible for submitting all IDAdmin/ITIM requests related to access to these systems
The business customer will be responsible for any Firewall Rule Requests and/or Security Exceptions, if needed.
There is no ITAR data on or related to these servers.
GTS or its Business partner will be responsible for server builds, Installations of supported Operating Systems, Databases, and Web Applications
A new server will be ordered to replace server TULSA-LN1 as part of this refresh activity.
The New server will be configured and installed in OK16.
Lotus Notes and other related setup files will be migrated to the new server as part of the activity.
900 GB of Internal storage is requested as part of this ISR.
Backup for the new server will be carried on as was done earlier for the old server. No changes. (Onsite backup will be utilized )
